mapper.select: select menus.id,menuname,url,parent from users,groups,ams,menus WHERE users.id = groups.user_id and groups.auth_id = ams.auth_id and ams.menu_id = menus.id and ams.type = 1 and parent = #{parent} and users.username = #{username} and users.state = '1' order by menus.id desc

SELECT id,menuname name,url,parent pId,level FROM menus where level = 0 union SELECT id,menuname name,url,parent pId,level FROM menus where level = 1 union SELECT id,menuname name,url,parent pId,level FROM menus where level = 2

select.if: select fun.id,fun.funchname,fun.funenname,(select menus.menuname from menus where menus.id = fun.menu_id) name from functions as fun order by fun.id desc

select fun.id,fun.funchname,fun.funenname,(select menus.menuname from menus where menus.id = fun.menu_id) name from functions as fun where fun.menu_id in (select id from menus where menus.parent = #{id}) order by fun.id desc
select fun.id,fun.funchname,fun.funenname,(select menus.menuname from menus where menus.id = fun.menu_id) name from functions as fun where fun.menu_id =#{id} order by fun.id desc

mapper.select: select id,url,parent pId,menuname name,level from menus where id = #{id}
select id,funchname,funenname,menu_id from functions where id = #{id}

SELECT id,menuname name,url,parent pId,level,'1' type,'true' open FROM menus where level = 0 union SELECT id,menuname name,url,parent pId,level,'1' type,'true' open FROM menus where level = 1 union SELECT id,menuname name,url,parent pId,level,'1' type,'true' open FROM menus where level = 2 UNION select (100000+id) id,functions.funchname name,'' url,functions.menu_id pId,'3' level,'2' type,'true' open from functions where functions.menu_id in (SELECT id FROM menus where level = 2)
